name: heart-sms-backend
description: Backend for HeartSMS, a fork of PulseSMS

scripts.build-dev: npm run docker:build && npm run db:build && npm run mqtt:build
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:build-latest && sudo docker push heartsms/heart-sms-backend:latest
scripts.docker:start: sudo docker-compose up -d heart-sms-backend heart-sms-db heart-sms-mqtt
scripts.db:init-dev: sudo docker volume rm heart-sms-backend_mysql-dev; sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up heart-sms-db
scripts.db:build: cd db && sudo docker build -t heartsms/heart-sms-db:dev .
scripts.db:build-latest: cd db && sudo docker build -t heartsms/heart-sms-db:latest .
scripts.db:push: npm run db:build-latest && sudo docker push heartsms/heart-sms-db:latest
scripts.mqtt:build: cd mqtt && sudo docker build -t heartsms/heart-sms-mqtt:dev .
scripts.mqtt:build-latest: cd mqtt && sudo docker build -t heartsms/heart-sms-mqtt:latest .
scripts.mqtt:push: npm run mqtt:build-latest && sudo docker push heartsms/heart-sms-mqtt:latest

author: Thomas Anderson
